data.message: I would like to change my name on facebook. I have been trying to do this for the past 1.5 years. The site is not allowing me to do such saying I changed my name within 60 days. This is not the case. Please help. Thank you.

replies.message: Hi there. Have you tried using these steps to change your name? Learn more: http://bit.ly/2cCrwkp. Please note that you can only change your name every 60 days. -Rey
I feel you my friend! I have the same issue. Facebook keeps ignoring me and I feel that they like to play with the law
I have proven my new name after marriage by sending the marriage certificate, and still nothing
Thanks Facebook for changing my name

Respected, Before I cameto my point, I hope you will be fine. I want more success in your life. Respected, I kindly request to you help me in the process reopen my Facebook account. from 27th June 2016 till today date My Facebook account block. I don't know what happened to my account. My Facebook account email address: Ahmadullah.zaland11@yahoo.com I hope you will do something. Sinceraly Ahmad
you should my friend is named Dawn Hines and wow you are not her lol good luck to you I have a native american name and they made me change it

I tried your directions and it says that I cannot change it because have changed it too many time ( not true). It further say a that I cannot because I didn't verify my name with Facebook. I don't recall being asked to. Please assist.  This shouldn't be this difficult.
Maria Dance...they changed it yesterday? Awesome.
Facebook some years ago my page was hacked named Sara Khan ... I logged many complains but facebook didn't listen to me and i still have the proof that the page belongs to me
Tried for a YEAR...I GAVE UP!!...😞🔨
